suggest.amasty/extra-fee-graph-ql: Install extra-fee-graph-ql module to be able to use Extra Fee GraphQL queries.
suggest.amasty/module-extra-fee-mftf-2: Install module-extra-fee-mftf-2 module to be able to run Extra Fee MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-extra-fee-mftf-3: Install module-extra-fee-mftf-3 module to be able to run Extra Fee MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
